[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [TextElementsRenderer](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer._constructor_.md)

## TextElementsRenderer.(constructor)

Create the `TextElementsRenderer` which selects which labels should be placed on screen as a preprocessing step, which is not done every frame, and also renders the placed \[\[TextElement\]\]s every frame.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(m_viewState: ViewState, m_viewCamera: THREE.Camera, m_viewUpdateCallback: ViewUpdateCallback, m_screenCollisions: ScreenCollisions, m_screenProjector: ScreenProjector, m_textCanvasFactory: TextCanvasFactory, m_poiManager: PoiManager, m_poiRendererFactory: PoiRendererFactory, m_fontCatalogLoader: FontCatalogLoader, m_theme: Theme, options: TextElementsRendererOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  m\_viewState | ViewState | State of the view for which this renderer will draw text. |
|  m\_viewCamera | THREE.Camera | Camera used by the view for which this renderer will draw text. |
|  m\_viewUpdateCallback | [ViewUpdateCallback](./harp-mapview.viewupdatecallback.md) | To be called whenever the view needs to be updated. |
|  m\_screenCollisions | ScreenCollisions | General 2D screen occlusion management, may be shared between instances. |
|  m\_screenProjector | ScreenProjector | Projects 3D coordinates into screen space. |
|  m\_textCanvasFactory | TextCanvasFactory | To create TextCanvas instances. |
|  m\_poiManager | [PoiManager](./harp-mapview.poimanager.md) | To prepare pois for rendering. |
|  m\_poiRendererFactory | PoiRendererFactory | To create PoiRenderer instances. |
|  m\_fontCatalogLoader | FontCatalogLoader | To load font catalogs. |
|  m\_theme | [Theme](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.md) | Theme defining text styles. |
|  options | TextElementsRendererOptions | Configuration options for the text renderer. See \[\[TextElementsRendererOptions\]\]. |
